title: MD
biography: Prince (Abeto Lij) Girma Yohannes Iyasu is the Iyasuist claimant to the throne of Ethiopian Empire. He is also known by the name Girma Amente Ghebresillasie.
aiSummary: Girma Taye is a infectious disease specialist with an H-index of 84 at Ethiopian Public Health Institute (Member). Has been published in The Lancet Neurology, The Lancet Child & Adolescent Health, Cell Reports. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
